Partner.definition: one of two or more persons associated as joint principals in carrying on a business for the purpose of enjoying a joint profit

general partner.definition: a partner whose liability for partnership debts and obligations is unlimited comparein this entry

lim·it·ed partner.definition: a partner in a venture who has no management authority and whose liability is limited to the amount of his or her investment comparein this entry

si·lent partner.definition: a partner who takes no active part in conducting the partnership business but who receives a share of its profits and whose existence is often not made public called also
